<h3 id="X22240">X(22240)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(2)X(216)&cap;X(3,112)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2 (a^6 b^2-a^4 b^4-a^2 b^6+b^8+a^6 c^2+a^4 b^2 c^2-a^2 b^4 c^2-b^6 c^2-a^4 c^4-a^2 b^2 c^4-a^2 c^6-b^2 c^6+c^8) : :
<p>
X(22240) lies on these lines: {2,216}, {3,112}, {6,22}, {20,39}, {23,5158}, {26,10312}, {32,7488}, {53,5133}, {187,10298}, {217,5889}, {376,14961}, {401,3329}, {566,858}, {570,1370}, {574,2071}, {577,6636}, {800,1194}, {1249,7494}, {1500,9538}, {1609,1627}, {1625,11459}, {1968,14118}, {1990,7495}, {1995,11062}, {2070,10986}, {2207,7503}, {2275,4296}, {2276,3100}, {2373,9087}, {2493,18573}, {2697,6795}, {2979,3289}, {3003,7493}, {3087,7500}, {3091,3199}, {3153,5475}, {3269,15072}, {3284,7492}, {3314,11672}, {3331,15305}, {5013,11413}, {5024,21312}, {5359,8573}, {5523,15760}, {6676,16318}, {6997,14576}, {7426,16328}, {7502,10317}, {7512,10316}, {7539,11197}, {7745,12225}, {7761,13219}, {9157,19153}, {9300,13351}, {9605,11414}, {9909,15851}, {10314,13595}, {10979,15246}, {11174,20477}, {15340,18474}, {15574,20806}, {16303,16387}, {19149,19158}<br>
</p>
<p>
X(22240) = crosssum of X(125) and X(3288)<br>
X(22240) = X(3402)-anticomplementary conjugate of X(8878)<br>
X(22240) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 232, 15355), (6, 22, 10313), (216, 232, 2), (800, 1194, 5304), (11417, 11418, 19121)<br>
